3. "37 % control" - This is a quantitative value or measurement, so it is not a disease entity.
4. "no change in response to ET-1 was observed" - "ET-1" is a chemical substance or hormone, so it is not a disease entity.

Therefore, the only disease entity mentioned in the paragraph is "disease".
